WorkItem.Description:
Using Rawr 2.3.2 on my Troll Hunter "ZeroUm" @ Warsong-US.
 
I'm seeing some weird suggestions of gems to use, it tells me I'll get at least 60+ dps increase using a mana regen blue gem instead of a pure agility. It also suggests stamina, crit and hit rating gems. Critical gem suggestions are ok, but I'm really confused by these other ones:
 
- Mana would only be more useful if I were to run OOM before the boss fight ends, but I do configure the fight simulation to last less than the OOM calculated value, and the suggestion doesn't change.
- Stamina is useful in the Survival tree, but I'm using Marksmanship and even then agility takes precedence.
- Hit rating gems would be nice if I weren't hit capped already.
 
Please correct me if I'm wrong.

Comments.Message:
Here's what I see when I open your char file:
1) Your Boss Armor is set to 15000, all WotLK bosses are 10643
2) Your Pet is completely UnBuffed, should add some buffs to him
3) You presently aren't meeting your Meta Gem Requirement (as denoted by the Red Box around your Helm), so of course it's gonna recommend at least one Green/Blue/Purple Gem so you can reactivate your Meta. Try purchasing a Nightmare Tear and equipping it to fulfill your Meta Gem Requirements (it satisfies the Relentless on it's own).
I've replaced the Slider with a ComboBox like other models use so bad Armor values can't be selected.
Did my previous statements resolve your issue?

Gemming to fulfill the meta gem requirement did it. Somehow I had it wrong in the Rawr model, the character in game does get that right.

Thanks for the answers.
